collectible.title: Nagisa's Bra
collectible.subtitle: Part of a matching set with her panties, but with cute lacy detailing around the cups
collectible.text: Did this fall out of Nagisa's bag as she was leaving? Is it a spare, or is she rushing home braless? You can ask her the next time you see her.

collectible.title: Nagisa's Panties
collectible.subtitle: The pattern resembles cherry blossoms, and there is a cute bow on each side
collectible.text: Nagisa was in such a hurry to leave after the game that she must have left these behind. You'll have to invite her to meet so that you can return them.

collectible.title: Nagisa's Skirt
collectible.subtitle: Standard issue for girls at Hikarizaka Private High School
collectible.text: When Nagisa was putting her skirt back on, the zipper broke! Flustered and with few options, she agreed to temporarily trade her skirt with what you wearing. And that is the story of how you wore Nagisa's skirt home, barely holding the zipper closed the whole way.
collectible.unlock: Make Nagisa more comfortable by letting her watch 10 different girls take off their skirts or dresses before she takes off hers.
